text: my name is Tony Lee I work for the New

actively exploring other technologies
such as envoy and prometheus our biggest
use case is kubernetes where it's helped

took a bit of changing in the

kind of modernize the way that the

that it's kind of like a guiding force
behind a lot of these open-source

receive a lot of guidance and support
and assurance for companies who are

reason why we think the CNC F is a good
